doctors.name: Dr. John Grohol
doctors.qualifications: PhD in Psychology, Licensed Clinical Psychologist
doctors.description: Dr. John Grohol is a renowned psychologist specializing in mental health disorders and behavioral therapy. With over 20 years of experience, he is an advocate for mental health awareness and patient empowerment.

doctors.name: Dr. Emily Anhalt
doctors.description: Dr. Emily Anhalt is a clinical psychologist with a focus on emotional fitness. She combines psychodynamic therapy with mindfulness techniques to treat conditions like OCD, PTSD, and Bipolar Disorder.

doctors.name: Dr. Rajeev Krishnan
doctors.qualifications: MD in Neurology, Fellowship in Geriatric Psychiatry
doctors.description: Dr. Rajeev Krishnan is a neurologist and psychiatrist specializing in age-related mental health disorders like dementia and schizophrenia. He is dedicated to improving the quality of life for his patients.

doctors.name: Dr. Laura Huang
doctors.qualifications: MD in Psychiatry, Certification in Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
doctors.description: Dr. Laura Huang is a board-certified psychiatrist with a passion for treating anxiety-related disorders. She emphasizes a holistic approach combining therapy and lifestyle modifications.

doctors.name: Dr. Ahmed Zayed
doctors.qualifications: MD in Psychiatry, Fellowship in Psychotic Disorders
doctors.description: Dr. Ahmed Zayed is a leading expert in psychotic disorders, offering compassionate care to patients with schizophrenia and obsessive-compulsive disorder. He is actively involved in mental health research.
